title: React is the best
content: I'm learning react and I love it!. It makes javascript so much nicer to write. I love the component architecture.

title: Why I Meditate
content: I've meditated daily for the past 30 years, and I think it has the single biggest impact on the quality of my life

title: Github is my friend
content: When I first started learning Github, it was not a happy relationship.

title: Bulma makes styling easy
content: I'm not a front end kind of girl. I want to like styling - I feel like I'm a creative persona and it should be fun, but CSS and I just don't get along.

title: The best pizza in town
content: Who doesn't love pizza? I found the best pizza in town yesterday and I'm so excited about it!
